idea-plugin.name: Json2Pojo
idea-plugin.description:
Allows for easy creation of Java POJOs from JSON, with GSON annotations and accessors. Once installed, just right-click on the destination package and choose "New -> Generate POJOs from JSON", then enter in your root class name and source JSON text.

Source code available on GitHub.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 1.0 - First revision.
  • 1.0.1 - Adding @Generated annotation to root class and SuppressWarnings (unused) for all generated classes.
  • 1.0.2 - Fixing handling of lowercase properties by uppercasing their field names and accessors.
  • 1.0.3 - Better discovery of field types when properties are missing or null.
  • 1.0.4 - Capitalizing words after underscores in field names.
  • 1.0.5 - Adding an option to generate builders and remove setters, making classes immutable.

action.description: Takes a source JSON text and converts it to a set of POJOs in a directory that can be deserialized with GSON.
